title: API Gateway to Lambda, DynamoDB, Kinesis, Lambda integration
description: API to trigger a Lambda function which save to DynamoDB, stream messages (with DynamoDB Stream) and trigger a Lambda function

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use Amazon API Gateway, AWS Lambda, Amazon DynamoDB and Kinesis together. When an HTTP POST request is made to the Amazon API Gateway endpoint, the AWS Lambda function is invoked and inserts an item into the Amazon DynamoDB table, then an event will be pushed into Kinesis and trigger a Lambda function.
